text: [Music]
that's
right we thrive on complexity at Harvard
Business School our community is a
mosaic every person in it reflects a
world of different talents beliefs and
cultures a variety of backgrounds life
experiences and aspirations we are a
community of different voices of
different voices different perspectives
encourag to speak up in fact the way we
learn here depends on it all of our
experiences even our personal struggles
and successes informs what we bring to
every case discussion at HBS we offer a
unique point of view to change the
conversation and we challenge ourselves
to listen to the point of view that will
change our own our conversations move
from the classroom to the campus where
the debate rages on long after the case
discussion ends everyone everyone
everyone is included even me and when we
let it happen the f that fuels our
everyday engagement can shape and
reshape us again and again before we
came to HBS some of us questioned if we
were good enough can I do that again we
are some of us wondered if we would
Thrive
here we do and now building on the
Bedrock core of who we are and what
brought us here we look to each other to
grow wiser and more compassionate to
learn how we can make a difference are
you ready to join
us
